[[WP:AES|â]]Undid revision 110873365 by [[Special:Contributions/Thomas Paine1776|Thomas Paine1776]] ([[User talk:Thomas Paine1776|talk]])
Unprotected Henry Ford: Page protected for a while; hopefully protection is no longer necessary.
/* Further reading alleging Ford's Anti-semitism */ again, no need for 'alleging'.
/* ''The Dearborn Independent'' */ no need for weasel words like alleged. all we know is he said it. remark is a synonym for statement, not for allegation.
/* Sidelights */Reinserted Henry's verified reincarnation beliefs. An important piece in understanding his motivations.
RV ThuranX is correct, you need to mind the consensus of other editors on the talk page, which is clearly against this class of change.
Ford historians dispute it, Ford's credible biographers dont' support the claim of the sensationalists, gossip and hearsay are not scholarship or proof of what Ford believed.
no. See the talk page. this is established in scholarly works, as documented throughout this page and the talk
Ford historians dispute, these are reasonable edits, if your going to have the accounts at least make them factual.
your edits are getting into a full blown whitewash now. Please stop for a while, let other editors consider you changes, and see what comes of it.
/* External links */ hearsay is not fact, reporters allegations are not fact, Ford recanted in 1927, and then gossip . . . . proves nothing

/* ''The Dearborn Independent'' */ at least make it factual, association fallacies don't prove anything about Henry Ford
/* ''The Dearborn Independent'' */ removing spec and POV word.
/* Further reading */ adjusting title to reflect list contents
